description:
I thought for the oral video for the week, I would get two of the straight guys to "Service" each other. (My knees hurt!)

We talked about it after the shoot, and now we know to put a dick in his mouth to get him going. I think he enjoys trying to turn someone on.
Now these type of vids, you gotta be a fan of them. Two uptight straight guys on a couch. One guy is a "ringer" put in there to ease things along. CLEARLY Steve is worried, and CLEARLY he's not put a dick in his mouth before.
His technique is almost comical. I did give him some hints along the way, but you may say to yourself "Um, has this guy even seen a dude get his cock sucked?"
So you have to chock his technique up to the reality that this guy has no idea what he is doing.
Ironically, Shawn seems to have a different jack off technique (kind of a helicopter action) and Steve's blow job seemed to keep him going.
Pretty good cumshot for the standard "side-by-side" bust shot. Well-timed and copious!
title: Shawn & Steve - Serviced
